trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
The following example first creates a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with one column, then creates a single <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會先建立新<xref:System.Data.DataTable>包含一個資料行，接著會建立單一<xref:System.Data.DataRow>。

trans-unit.source: As the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> is created, added, modified, and deleted, its <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> is printed.
trans-unit.target: 做為<xref:System.Data.DataRow>是建立、 新增、 修改和刪除，其<xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>列印。

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection" />, and <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 資料列已經加入至 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection" />，並且尚未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" />。

trans-unit.source: The row was deleted using the <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.Delete" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.Delete" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 方法來刪除資料列。

trans-unit.source: The row has been created but is not part of any <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 資料列已建立，但它不屬於任何 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to a collection, or if it has been removed from a collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 在已經建立後、加入至集合前，或如果已經從集合移除後，會立即處在這個狀態中。

trans-unit.source: The row has been modified and <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> has not been called.
trans-unit.target: 已經修改資料列，並且尚未呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" />。

trans-unit.source: The row has not changed since <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> was last called.
trans-unit.target: 資料列從上次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> 之後就未變更。
